Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: K2 is Orn. The C-terminal V forms an ester bond with the side chain of Y3.
Sequence Information.Function: Active against fungi C. Albicans and A.niger.

Literature.Title: Purification, biochemical characterization and self-assembled structure of a fengycin-like antifungal peptide from Bacillus thuringiensis strain SM1.
Literature.Author: Roy A, Mahata D, Paul D, Korpole S, Franco OL, Mandal SM.

Literature.Title: Lipopeptides from the banyan endophyte, Bacillus subtilis K1 mass spectrometric characterization of a library of fengycins.
